title: Cannot login to account
description: User reports that they cannot login using their registered email and password. They receive 'Invalid credentials' error message. Password reset link also not working.

title: Document upload fails for large PDF files
description: Users are unable to upload PDF files larger than 50MB. The upload progress bar reaches 100% but then shows an error. This affects multiple users on the Basic plan.

title: Request to increase API rate limits
description: Enterprise customer requesting higher API rate limits. Current limit of 10,000 requests/hour is insufficient for their integration needs. They need at least 50,000 requests/hour.

title: Mobile app crashes on iOS 18
description: Multiple users reporting that the iOS mobile app crashes immediately upon launch after updating to iOS 18. The app was working fine before the iOS update.

title: Search not returning recent documents
description: User uploaded documents yesterday but they don't appear in search results. All other documents are searchable. User has tried refreshing and clearing cache.

title: Billing charged twice for January subscription
description: Customer was charged twice for their Professional plan subscription on January 1st. They have provided transaction IDs and bank statements as proof.

title: Feature request: Dark mode for mobile app
description: Multiple users have requested dark mode support for the mobile app. Desktop version already has dark mode. This would improve usability for users working in low-light environments.

title: Slack integration not sending notifications
description: Team has configured Slack integration but notifications for document mentions and comments are not being sent. Integration appears connected in settings.

title: Password reset email not received
description: User requested password reset multiple times but is not receiving the email. They have checked spam folder. Email address is confirmed to be correct.

title: Documentation request: API webhook examples
description: Developer requests more detailed webhook documentation with code examples in Python, Node.js, and Ruby. Current docs only show basic curl examples.
resolution: Documentation updated with comprehensive webhook examples in Python, Node.js, Ruby, and Go. Available at docs.example.com/webhooks
